Author: portLAN
Content: The real tiger can never compete with the paper one.  Facebook and Flickr use PHP; MySpace uses ColdFusion and/or ASP.NET; doing it NOW with crappy tools is scrappy, the start-up way.  Start-ups don't wait for the stars to align.
